div.div: See the Agenda for call in number

Our Mission Our mission is to provide a safe learning environment that challenges all students to achieve academic excellence, develop their creative potential, and acquire marketable career, technical, and personal skills.

div.p: Meet our Board members and learn about the policies that govern our school district.
